author: bainbrid
body:
This PR is equivalent to the open [#25455](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25455) PR, but rebased to 10_2_X using a very recent IB.

This PR was opened in response to [this](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25455#issuecomment-454719227) instruction.
title: Low pT electrons (up to GsfTracks) for 10_2_X
